About the projectAbout the project

Viarium – is a unique platform that combines a network of virtual space and augmented reality for the sale of goods and services. With the help of Viarium the implementation of goods and services will be possible indeed. Do shopping at VR shopping malls and showrooms, share new opportunities with your friends, family and the whole world while earning at the new generation Viarium platform!

You can connect your own server

Guaranteed security of your business using the blockchain technology

The world grows unlimitedly
